1"""Functions and methods which allow for ease of interacting with web based 

2resources. Included here are functions which download files, query web resources 

3and other things. This interacts mostly with HTTP based services.""" 

4 

5import os 

6import shutil 

7import time 

8import urllib.request 

9import requests 

10 

11import opihiexarata.library as library 

12import opihiexarata.library.error as error 

13import opihiexarata.library.hint as hint 

14 

15 

16def get_http_status_code(url: str) -> int: 

17 """This gets the http status code of a web resource. 

18 

19 Parameters 

20 ---------- 

21 url : string 

22 The url which the http status code will try and obtain. 

23 

24 Return 

25 ------ 

26 status_code : int 

27 The status code. 

28 """ 

29 web_request = requests.get(url) 

30 status_code = web_request.status_code 

31 return status_code 

32 

33 

34def api_request_sleep(seconds: float = None) -> None: 

35 """Sleep for the time, specified in the configuration file, for API 

36 requests. This function exists to ensure uniformity in application. 

37 

38 Parameters 

39 ---------- 

40 seconds : float, default = None 

41 The number of seconds that the program should sleep for. If not 

42 provided, then it defaults to the configuration value. 

43 

44 Results 

45 ------- 

46 None 

47 """ 

48 SLEEP_SECONDS = library.config.API_CONNECTION_REQUEST_SLEEP_SECONDS 

49 seconds = seconds if seconds is not None else SLEEP_SECONDS 

50 time.sleep(seconds) 

51 return None 

52 

53 

54def download_file_from_url(url: str, filename: str, overwrite: bool = False) -> None: 

55 """Download a file from a URL to disk. 

56 

57 ..warning:: The backend of this function relies on a function which may be 

58 depreciated in the future. This function may need to be rewritten. 

59 

60 Parameters 

61 ---------- 

62 url : string 

63 The url which the file will be downloaded from. 

64 filename : string 

65 The filename where the file will be saved. 

66 overwrite : bool, default = False 

67 If the file already exists, overwrite it. If False, it would raise 

68 an error instead. 

69 """ 

70 # See if the file exists, if so, delete it if overwrite is True, to simulate 

71 # overwriting the file. 

72 if os.path.isfile(filename): 

73 # The file exists. Check if it should be overridden or not. 

74 if overwrite: 

75 # Overwrite the file, mostly by deleting it then writing to disk. 

76 os.remove(filename) 

77 else: 

78 # Cannot overwrite file. 

79 raise error.FileError( 

80 "The filename provided already exists: \n {fname}".format( 

81 fname=filename 

82 ) 

83 ) 

84 # Save the file. We supply here two methods in the event the first really 

85 # does get removed. 

86 try: 

87 urllib.request.urlretrieve(url, filename) 

88 except Exception: 

89 # Alternative method. 

90 with urllib.request.urlopen(url) as in_stream, open(filename, "wb") as out_file: 

91 shutil.copyfileobj(in_stream, out_file) 

92 return None
